HEADER.Title: Run command given command via ssh for windows

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
! Define action specific java options and values : SET &ACTION_NAME# = "RunCommandAction"
: SET &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD# = 'java -jar "&UC4RB_SSH_JARPATH#"' : SET &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JAVA_CMD#, " -action &ACTION_NAME#")
: SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# =&UC4RB_CMD_FILE_PATH# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SONIC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JAVA_CMD#, " -cmdfile &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
: SET &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JAVA_CMD#, " -outputmode &UC4RB_OUTPUTMODE#")
: IF &UC4RB_OUTPUTMODE# NE "0" ! create std output log file : SET &UC4RB_FILE_PATH# = STR_CAT(&AGENT_TEMPDIR#,"/output-&$RUNID#.log") : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# =&UC4RB_FILE_PATH# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SONIC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JAVA_CMD#, " -outfile &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") : SET &UC4RB_OUTPUT_LOG# = &UC4RB_FILE_PATH# ! create std error log file : SET &UC4RB_FILE_PATH# = STR_CAT(&AGENT_TEMPDIR#,"/error-&$RUNID#.log") : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# =&UC4RB_FILE_PATH# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SONIC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JAVA_CMD#, " -errfile &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
: SET &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JAVA_CMD#, " &UC4RB_SSH_ARGS#")
! Invoking java binar &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD#
